hackathon-description-text: Come out to Brooklyn and hack out of a 25,000 square foot warehouse! We want to encourage collaboration between students, artists, and developers and anybody else interested in learning and creating.
hackathon-eligibility: Individuals interested in building and expressing themselves through technology
hackathon-requirements:
You are free to create whatever you want. However, keep in mind the prize categories.
 
:
Community Development
Red Hook Transportation
Coastal Awareness
Most "Awesome" Hack
hackathon-rules:
- You cannot work on your project before the day of the event
- Give credit where credit is due
- The decision of judges is final for determining prizes and awards
- Please comply with all instructions from HackRedHook organizers

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Red Hook Crit x Timbuk2 Especial Claro Messenger Bag
2 Tickets to the Brooklyn Nets Playoff Game on 4/25
The NY Theremin society is looking for someone to help them with some web design and Leap Motion Visualization! They are awarding the following:

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=159 Pioneer Street, Brooklyn, NY 11231, USA
